name: Wizard's Warp
storyline: Opening your eyes you feel the dampness of a deep cave, and memories jumble in your head. As you gather your thoughts, fear and the horror of loss overtake you. Your favorite cat has been stolen! Now you have to get to the top to save him, but it won't be easy at all
summary: Always wanted to learn how to teleport? Try not to get stuck in a wall! Wizard's Warp, a platformer that challenges those who are not afraid of hard challenges. Get to the top to save your favorite cat! But if you fall down, be ready for a rough landing.
